articles.description: Follow live text commentary as Andy Farrell takes charge of his first match in charge against Argentina in Dublin, before departing for Australia.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025 LIVE: Warm-up match against Argentina - live text, latest scores and photos

articles.description: India captain Shubman Gill and opener Yashasvi Jaiswal hit sublime centuries as England toil on day one of the first Test at Headingley.
articles.title: England vs India: Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal make Headingley hundreds

articles.description: Liverpool agree a £40m deal to sign Hungary left-back Milos Kerkez from Bournemouth.
articles.title: Liverpool agree £40m deal to sign Milos Kerkez from Bournemouth

articles.description: Former Ajax winger Quincy Promes has been extradited to the Netherlands, where he will serve a seven-and-a-half-year prison sentence for drug trafficking and aggravated assault.
articles.title: Quincy Promes extradited to the Netherlands to serve prison sentence

articles.description: A court case against England goalkeeper Khiara Keating has been dropped nearly a year after she pleaded not guilty to possessing canisters of nitrous oxide.
articles.title: Khiara Keating: Charges dropped against Manchester City and England goalkeeper

articles.description: Former Real Madrid and Wales star Gareth Bale was part of a rejected bid launched in May to buy hometown club Cardiff City.
articles.title: Gareth Bale part of group to have Cardiff City takeover bid rejected

articles.description: A number of new innovations to football have been on show since the start of the 2025 Club World Cup
articles.title: Club World Cup 2025: Tournament's new innovations to football

articles.description: Tampa Bay Rays player Hunter Bigge is taken to hospital after being hit by a 105mph foul ball while in the dugout at a Major League Baseball game.
articles.title: Tampa Bay Rays v Baltimore Orioles: Hunter Bigge hospitalised by foul ball

articles.description: World number one Jannik Sinner swaps his tennis racquet for a microphone to release a duet with fellow Italian and tenor Andrea Bocelli.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner releases duet with Italian tenor Andrea Bocelli

articles.description: Nolann Le Garrec and Antoine Hastoy will form a strong half-back partnership for the France second-string XV that takes on an England XV on Saturday.
articles.title: England XV v France XV: Nolann Le Garrec starts for visitors
